structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.text: It shall be unlawful to make, in any manner whatsoever, any false or deceptive statement or representation in regard to any fertilizer offered for sale, sold, or distributed in this state, or to use any misleading or deceptive trademark or brand name in connection therewith.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 14, effective July 13, 1984.
